description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pocket-Jongg 2009 is a new twist on an old classic Mahjongg style game. Unique rules, that the player has to discover first, will keep you up all night. The game also features several different multi-player options for parties using one XBox or Live play. Unlock new levels in the Campaign Mode and find out, what else you can do...are the single player modes "really" single player?
